title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 100.8 - Local high school equivalency diploma
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 100.8 - Local high school equivalency diploma

State Regulations

Boards of education specified by the commissioner may award
a local high school equivalency diploma based upon experimental programs
approved by the commissioner until August 31, 2016, after which date such
boards may no longer award a local high school equivalency
diploma. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
